message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CV 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a system that uses natural language processing techniques to transform recipes into different regional styles. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also likely as the system uses a neural network to suggest ingredient substitutions. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the system uses machine learning techniques to identify the degree of regional cuisine style mixture and visualize it using barycentric Newton diagrams. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is a possible category as the system uses an extended word2vec model to suggest ingredient substitutions. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is less likely but still possible as the system may use image recognition techniques to identify the visual characteristics of different regional cuisine styles.
